asset.title: Richard Simmons: Project HOPE™ Full Infomercial
asset.description:
Project HOPE™ is Richard Simmons' newest and most effective weight loss exercise system featuring 9 all-new workouts designed to transform your body in just 90 days. Sculpt, strengthen and blast calories with Richard's Triple Training method and his revolutionary new electronic FOODMOVER. Project HOPE can help you burn up to 3X more fat than with just cardio alone. Plus, you'll HAVE FUN while you do it!

Launch DRTV was lucky enough to work with the top selling infomercial celebrity of all time, Richard Simmons. His passion for helping people to live healthy lives is inspiring.
asset.author: Official Launch DRTV
